website_summaries.verdict: The brand's classic eyeshadow palette features 16 matte and shimmer chocolate-inspired shades that contain real cocoa.
pros: Customers rave about the perfect chocolate shades and lush neutral colors that are silky smooth and long-lasting
Larger pan sizes for two highlighter shades that get more use
Use this palette to create a sultry brown smoky eye
cons: The consistency is powdery, which some users find chalky

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this minutes ago after it arrived. It's a mess! Not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: TTouch

customer_reviews.title: too faced is amazing and so is the semi sweet chocolate bar
customer_reviews.text: too faced is amazing and so is the semi sweet chocolate bar. this palette has so many great shades from matte to shimmer I use it almost daily, when not using my naked palette. its versatile color choices range from natural to total glam and when using a quality primer the color lasts all day or night. the pigmentation is amazing, a little goes a long way. the smell of these shadows is amazing, you could almost eat it. now if someone would send me the sweet peached i would be in total too faced heaven
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great palette
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette. I was disappointed to unpack it and find that one of the shadows had depotted and crumbled all over the palette. However, compared to other reviews I think I’m lucky that only one shade was broken. I was able to use an eyeshadow brush to sweep about half of the product back into the pan and repress it. Otherwise it is a quality product that appears to be authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: damaged item !!! messsssss!
customer_reviews.text: eyeshadow pallete arrived shuttered !! the black shadow was all over and stained the whole palette including my kitchen table and my hands . returning .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Just wish it wasn't broken!
customer_reviews.text: The palette it self is beautiful and of course it smells phenomenal that makes me want to it! Lol the reason for the 1 star is because when it arrived in the mail the palette was broken!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chocolate
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. Stays on all day, no issues. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: V Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: It came broken and got black all over everything. got a refund!!! I love the company and the eye shadows I just don't want to open it and have it pour all over me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little makeup thing.
customer_reviews.text: Great little makeup thingy, I got this for my girlfriend and she loved it!! and as a guy I love the smell of this stuff it makes my girlfriend smell like a multitude of chocolates at any given time! perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I got a notification on my phone on my way home from work that it had arrived and I couldn't wait to get home and open it. I can't stop smelling it. It smells devine and heavenly. I can't wait to try it out especially the peanut butter. I will be using that color like crazy. Thank you for my Chocolate Bar eye-shadow palette.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bell

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice and broken both times
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product twice and arrived broken both times. Company has been great and exchanged it but I think twice and I am done with it.
customer_reviews.author: sandim36

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This came completely destroyed and incredibly messy. The black (licorice) was cracked and ruined every other shade. The black got everywhere. Not worth the money. Go directly through too faced
customer_reviews.author: Langston Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My product was authentic--smells like chocolate, little fall-out, and stays-put all day (though, I do use a primer as well). Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H.

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Mine is real I so love the pallet my first high end great price using it every day so excited to have it
customer_reviews.author: Cindie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makeup stays on all day and the colors are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: jordin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Horrible !!! Powder was everywhere and one shade was missing. The black sad also looked like it had been used over and over. There were many divots in other eyeshadows. I am extremely PISSED. If I didn’t have to star this I wouldn’t have
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: It came broken!!! And right when I opened the black one just went every where I’m so mad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love the colors, the scent and the packaging. It's pricey but in my opinion, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Guidomom

customer_reviews.title: This came sealed and super bubble wrapped
customer_reviews.text: This came sealed and super bubble wrapped. It's perfect and my daughter freaked out. Nothing can prepare you for how delicious it smells!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa DuBois

customer_reviews.title: You need to try this
customer_reviews.text: I just love the pallet and the shadow goes on so grear
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I Likey!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and it arrived damaged in shipping. Wrote the seller and they cheerfully replaced the item, which arrived today in great shape. The colors are gorgeous and easy to apply. The shades are fairly well pigmented and not overly frosted. This is a fairly neutral brown palatte, but there are both warm and cool tones as well as a wide range of darks through highlights to mix, match, blend. They also smell yummy! That's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: M. SpaldingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Black eyeshadow explosion
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived fast, when I opened packaged the black eye shadow was all over the rest of the pallet and all Over the box. M yhands and clothing were covered as well.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Came all broken and messed up not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous to order this because of negative reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to order this because of negative reviews but its authentic, wasn't broken, sealed and unused. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia DiGallo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I RECOMMEND IT 100% !!!! FELL IN LOVE WITH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing to Open.
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to receive my too faced semi sweet chocolate bar pallet in the mail. When it came in the mall almost immediately i realized something wasn't right, After opening my product I knew I was right, it's completely fake. the colors are flat and have barely any pigment. I am not in anyway saying the real Too Faced pallet is low quality, but the one I received in the mail from this exact user is totally, completely, not real. I'm embarrassed that I wasted my time shopping on Amazon for makeup. 50 dollars down the drain. I do NOT recommend, at least not from this user.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bousquet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my girlfriend loved it. she uses it every day and it makes her feel beautiful and happy
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! It smells awesome and goes on so smooth love it worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints. The eyeshadows are buttery and apply beautifully. Also, the smell is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The palette was way too dry and did not stick at all to my eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: W. R.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Omg i love this palette! Every color is gorgeous and just for those who want to know yes it does smell like chocolate. Well more like a hot cocoa chocolate but still delicious. The colors are so beautifully pigmented and buttery iv had no fallout from any of these shadows either. I will defi itly buy again
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: in love
customer_reviews.text: so pigmented and smells soooooo good. my current go to palette.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love Too Faced!
customer_reviews.text: My eye shadow came earlier than expected! I have the first Too Faced chocolate bar and I love it. I wanted some more color choices so that's why I ordered this. I appreciated that this came super wrapped in bubble wrap so it was not damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Im very upset my eyeshadow pallette came shattered. I want a new one or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup.
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite makeup. It doesn't hurt that it smells great too
customer_reviews.author: somewhereoutthere

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but BROKEN?!?
customer_reviews.text: I love all the colors and it's beautiful but IT CAME CRACKED!!! I opened it in my bed too and when I opened it all the powder went on my bed :(( has nothing to do with Amazon just don't ever buy eye shadow online , can easily break in the mail just warning everyone , because I waisted my money :((
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Looked liked it had been used or cleaned up
customer_reviews.text: Came in broken... was bubbled wrapped and the black was everywhere! Looked liked it had been used or cleaned up. Every color had "swirl" marks on it. However, they did send me a new one, and it came in perfect!
customer_reviews.author: valeska

customer_reviews.title: ... have to say that the original Chocolate Bar was better than this one
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that the original Chocolate Bar was better than this one. This one is good, but not great. The shadows were not that pigmented and the colors did not really vary.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nope.  Bad Idea.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this palette as a gift for a friend for Christmas. She later slept with my boyfriend. Clearly, she was hoping for the ABH Modern Renaissance palette instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it zero stars I would. ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars I would. Got my pallet in the mail with the shadows shattered and mixed in with the other shadows. The whole pallet was covered in shadows as well as the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dzjanae H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this!! I was a little scared because of the reviews saying it was fake but i got the real thing.colors are beautiful and very pigmented and it smells like cocoa which i love.best purchase ive made on here so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I have owned in the past and I don't usually call expensive
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this worked on me just like any other makeup. Not sure if it's worth all that.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: just some advice
customer_reviews.text: i wish i had gotten chocolate bon bon by too faced instead because this doesn't have a lot of brights but thats my fault . i looooove the palette overall . id say buy this to anyone who asked but feel like i need some brighter contrasting colors to make these browns really pop . just some advice .
customer_reviews.author: Keturah W.

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I received mine all broken. Very dissapointmed in this, what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha thompson

customer_reviews.title: The BEST eyeshadow palette I have ever owned or used
customer_reviews.text: The BEST eyeshadow palette I have ever owned or used. Also it arrived a day early and the colors are BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Semi Chocolate Bar
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors in this palette and they are infused with chocolate and smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Helena's Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Packaged was damaged... my first for an ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaged was damaged... my first for an amazon shipment. The colors or lighter than expected and not as pigmented as I had hoped. I will instead used these colors as transition colors.
customer_reviews.author: sephora's a dream

customer_reviews.title: It's authentic they smell so good but I thought they were going to be very ...
customer_reviews.text: It's authentic they smell so good but I thought they were going to be very pigmented and they weren't especially blueberry swirl and Caramel & bonbon😔
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife is very happy with this. It's her second set and she likes them both.
customer_reviews.author: TheooT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good! I love the colors in this palette, and it arrived without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Zinck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as the original one
customer_reviews.text: I stay an absolute fan of Too Faced palettes and have a lot, including the original chocolate bar palette. Good quality and lasts all day on a base as MAC Paintpot. Also easy to blend. I personally use my original chocolate palette more because it permits more colors combinations. But this one is also perfect as an addition, more in the neutral-brown range (warm+cool) + a nice blue. Colors names are written on the palette and not on a separated sheet (more practical!) I agree with the opinion of other people; the pink color is very disappointing, it doesn't transfer on the eye even with a MAC Fix+. But all the other colors are just perfect and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very good..except the blue..didn't turn out good at all on me. I have med-light skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Ka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful-Chocolate Lover
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pleasure to use. I am addicted to the chocolate scent. The black is now the blackest shade I own; it applies like gel. Some of the colours don't show up very well on dark skin so I have to use a white base or concealer to get good payoff. The light sparkly pink is meant to just add shimmer I think and not an actual shade. This is beautiful. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Jarna H

customer_reviews.title: all seem to have good color pay off when swatches except for the shade ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, all shadows in tacked, none are broken. all seem to have good color pay off when swatches except for the shade called pink sugar.. it barely shows up at all on my skin. But other then that I am very pleased with this palette and think it's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Teran

customer_reviews.title: Smells like hot cocoa...
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer it come with an applicator, but the slight chocolate smell is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Z.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this palette
customer_reviews.text: I really like this palette. All colors are very pigmented. Well.. almost all of them. The only one I really don't like is the blue honestly. I know many people dont like the pink one, but I think it is great to put it over another color to give it some shimmer. The blue is really not very pigmented, but all together I would recommend this palette!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled!
customer_reviews.text: Colors look great in the bar until you swatch them. They have hardly any color payoff and are chalky and don't blend well. It's a fake pallet. The real one at Sephora has amazing color pay off and blends beautifully. Yet again Amazon is selling fake product. Will be returning. The picture of my arm shows you how the colors look very bland and sheer chalky. The picture of the zoomed in swatches that are more uniform shows you the REAL pallet. Notice the big difference!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

product_meta.title: Too Faced Semi Sweet Chocolate Bar
product_meta.description: "Inspired by the success of our original cocoa-infused Chocolate Bar Eye Shadow Collection, Semi-Sweet Chocolate Bar is a deeper, warmer version of our best-selling palette. The Semi-Sweet Chocolate experience begins as soon as you open the palette and the smell of sweet chocolate envelopes you. This indulgent palette features 16 antioxidant-rich, cocoa powder-infused shadows in matte and shimmer shades of warm caramels, deep mochas, bronzy chocolate hues and a pop of sugared blueberry. Includes our signature how-to Glamour Guide with three looks to get you started. " MORE TO LOVE: Too Faced Co-Founder & Chief Creative Officer Jerrod Blandino was inspired to infuse antioxidant-rich cocoa in makeup while getting a chocolate facial at a Hawaiian spa. He learned of chocolate’s benefits to the skin and included the ingredient in Too Faced’s best-selling Chocolate Soleil Bronzer, Chocolate Bar Eye Shadow Collection, Cocoa Powder Foundation and now Semi-Sweet Chocolate Bar Eye Shadow Collection. An indulgent range of deep, warm chocolate shadows infused with pure, antioxidant-rich cocoa powder. 16 brand new shades allow limitless looks and includes our signature how-to Glamour Guide with three looks to get you started. Rich, high-pigment shadows offer true color payoff. Research has shown that the smell of cocoa can improve your mood and make you more relaxed.
